item.title: [PI]Quick Chat problems
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Add this above the switch statement in ClickingButtons.java

for (int i = 0; i < c.qCAB.length; i++) { if (actionButtonId == c.qCAB[i][0] ){ for (int j = 0; j < c.qCS.length; j++) { if ( j == i ) { c.forcedText = c.qC+ "My " +c.qCS[j]+ " Level is " +c.getLevelForXP(c.playerXP[c.qCAB[i][1]])+ "."; c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; } } } }

Then go into Client.java and add this anywhere:

[code] public String[] qCS = { “Attack”, “Strength”, “Defence”, “Ranged”, “Prayer”, “Magic”, “Runecrafting”
, “Hitpoints”, “Agility”, “Herblore”, “Thieving”, “Crafting”, “Fletching”, “Slayer”
, “Mining”, “Smithing”, “Fishing”, “Cooking”, “Firemaking”, “Woodcutting”, “Farming”
, “Pking”, “Hunter”, “Summoning”
};

public int[][] qCAB = { {121135, 0}, 
						{121140, 2}, 
						{121145, 1}, 
						{121150, 4}, 
						{121155, 5}, 
						{121160, 6}, 
						{121165, 20}, 
						{121180, 3}, 
						{121185, 16}, 
						{121190, 15}, 
						{121195, 17}, 
						{121200, 12}, 
						{121205, 9}, 
						{121210, 18}, 
						{121225, 14}, 
						{121230, 13}, 
						{121235, 10}, 
						{121240, 7}, 
						{121245, 11}, 
						{121250, 8}, 
						{121255, 19},
						{121170, 22},
						{121215, 21},
						{122004, 23}
			 };
public String qC = "[Quick Chat] ";[/code]

Don’t forget to change the button ids and skill numbers to fit your server.

Example:
{122004, 23}

122004 = button id.
23 = skill id.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI]Quick Chat problems
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Well, I’ve been trying to add quick chat into my PI for about an hour now, and every method I try either comes up with errors or doesn’t work when I click on the skill.

//Quick chat case 121135: //Attack c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Attack level is " + c.playerLevel[0] + "."); break; case 121140: //Strength c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Strength level is " + c.playerLevel[1] + "."); break; case 121145: //Defence c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Defence level is " + c.playerLevel[2] + "."); break; case 121180: //Hitpoints c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Hitpoints level is " + c.playerLevel[3] + "."); break; case 121150: //Range c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Range level is " + c.playerLevel[4] + "."); break; case 121155: //Prayer c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Prayer level is " + c.playerLevel[5] + "."); break; case 121160: //Magic c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Magic level is " + c.playerLevel[6] + "."); break; case 121240: //Cooking c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Cooking level is " + c.playerLevel[7] + "."); break; case 121250: //Woodcutting c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Woodcutting level is " + c.playerLevel[8] + "."); break; case 121205: //Fletching c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Fletching level is " + c.playerLevel[9] + "."); break; case 121235: //Fishing c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Fishing level is " + c.playerLevel[10] + "."); break; case 121245: //Firemaking c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Firemaking level is " + c.playerLevel[11] + "."); break; case 121200: //Crafting c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Crafting level is " + c.playerLevel[12] + "."); break; case 121230: //Smithing c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Smithing level is " + c.playerLevel[13] + "."); break; case 121225: //Mining c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Mining level is " + c.playerLevel[14] + "."); break; case 121190: //Herblore c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Herblore level is " + c.playerLevel[15] + "."); break; case 121185: //Agility c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Agility level is " + c.playerLevel[16] + "."); break; case 121195: //Thieving c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Thieving level is " + c.playerLevel[17] + "."); break; case 121210: //Slayer c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Slayer level is " + c.playerLevel[18] + "."); break; case 121255: //Farming c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Farming level is " + c.playerLevel[19] + "."); break; case 121165: //Runecrafting c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Runecrafting level is " + c.playerLevel[20] + "."); break; case 122004: //Construction c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Construction level is " + c.playerLevel[21] + "."); break; case 121175: //Hunter c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Hunter level is " + c.playerLevel[22] + "."); break; case 121215: //Summoning c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Summoning level is " + c.playerLevel[23] + "."); break; case 121170: //Dungeoneering c.forcedChat("[Quick Chat] My Dungoneering level is " + c.playerLevel[24] + "."); c.forcedChatUpdateRequired = true; c.updateRequired = true; break;
The last skill up there (dungeoneering) has 2 extra lines because I thought maybe that was the problem but it still showed nothing when I clicked on the skill
I wrote those codes myself and I checked each actionbutton as I wrote them.

I also tried placing that in more then one file, though it belongs in Clickingbuttons.java

Read full topic
